Render DataTable to HTML

Source: R/render_datatable.R
render_datatable.Rd

This function is a wrapper around the DT::datatable function, containing useful defaults.

Usage

render_datatable(df)

Arguments

df

Dataframe to render

Value

An HTML widget

Examples

render_datatable(datasets::mtcars)
